value:
What do I want out of my marriage?
It's simple. I'd be happiest knowing
my husband is safe and sound.

Tell me. Do you believe in love? Do
you have someone special out there,
$Nu?

I've heard that the secret to a happy
marriage is consideration. Always
show your partner that you care.

I have some experience fighting
infantry battles without my pegasus.
Not dressed like this, of course...

This dress fits me perfectly.
Somehow...I can't help but smile
while wearing it.

Hello! I bring wishes for your health
and happiness, sent warmly
by $Nf.

Do you think I'll make a good
match?

We learn each and every day...
In battle, and in marriage, too.
I'm so sorry!

I owe you much for your
kindness.

I am Princess Caeda of Talys. I was
daydreaming about wearing a bridal
gown just like this one...and then...

What does love mean to you?
Tell me, $Nu.$k$pAs long as the person I love is safe
and happy... That's really all that
matters to me.$k$pWearing this dress got me thinking,
though. When they wed, two people
vow to make each other happy.$k$pIf I were to die... I'm sure that the
person I love would be sad. I
wonder... Is that what love is?$k$pLove isn't as simple as it seems. And
I'm sure we all feel it differently...$k$pWhat does love mean to you?
Please, if you would, share your
thoughts with me.
やぁっ！
Here I go!
いやぁっ！
My dress!
May love triumph!
Away from my bouquet!
I believe in love!
I've waited for this!
My flowers...
Heehee
Tell me—how do I look?
I know it's silly to fuss...but I do want my tresses to impress on my big day.
I've adored dresses like this ever since I was a child.
I wonder where the perfect place to hold a wedding is around here!
There is nothing more beautiful than two people pledging their love to one another.
I vow that if our lives are put in grave peril, I will be the one to fall. Not you.
I know this is all just for fun, but someday...? Well, a girl can dream, can't she?
Yes?
If only...
Ah, love.
Do you believe in love everlasting?
